data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ferrao, Miqueias, Moravec, Jiri, Fraga, Rafael de, Almeida, Alexandre Pinheiro de, Kaefer, Igor Luis, Lima, Albertina Pimentel (2017): A new species of Scinax from the Purus-Madeira interfluve, Brazilian Amazonia (Anura, Hylidae). ZooKeys 706: 137-162, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.706.14691, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.706.14691
